nodes.text: Control was a Corellian corvette used by the Galactic Empire.

The corvette served as a minor flagship for TIE Bombers that attacked and destroyed a Rebel depot consisting of two groups of Lambda-class shuttles Enouck and Xarxis, 4 transports Axet, 2 Utility Tugs T-ST and T-SP and two groups of Class-A cargo containers Vic and Limi. The corvette had its own transport Walker 1 to reload any TIE Bomber with new warheads once they run out.
